name: Beyond our Sight
description:
Help the two friend Alice and Anton in this asymmetric coop puzzle game. Make use of their unique outlooks on life and play with a friend to escape school! Each player has a set of different skills to help you navigating through the school halls and solving puzzles together as a team.

This game was created as part of a university project by Team Two*2:

Oliver Jung

Moritz Schirra

Maximilian Hess

Viktoria Kirchleitner
